actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that any 5-year level premium term plan policy of national service life insurance shall be deemed paid when premiums paid in less dividends, equal the amount of the policy.

summary.text: Provides that any five-year level premium term plan policy of national service life insurance for veterans shall be deemed paid when premiums paid in, less dividends, equal the amount of the policy. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 705)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that any 5-year level premium term plan policy of national service life insurance shall be deemed paid when premiums paid in less dividends, equal the amount of the policy.
